message: The DATA_VALIDATION field for indicator 10-7-1, translated into en
data: SDG 10.7.1 was reclassified as a tier II indicator on October 2019. At present, National Statistical Offices are at different stages of piloting the methodology and data collection strategy at nationa level. The ILO, as co-custodian agency, provides ongoing technical support to countries with the planning, conduct, analysis and quality assessment of the resulting data. Only data on SDG 10.7.1 that has been officially published by the relevant national authority is reported to the SDGs Indicators Database.
